reactogon

Class Constraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactogon.Constraint

  • public class Constraint
extends java.lang.Object
    class to hold the contraints of where things will be placed in the UI Usefull for mouse detection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Takes the contraints of the area that an image/place of images is in
      Constraint(java.lang.String name, int x, int y, int dx, int dy, boolean createSubConstraints)
      Used for adding image/objects inside the contraints grid

      • Constraint

        public Constraint(java.lang.String name,
          int x,
          int y,
          int dx,
          int dy,
          boolean createSubConstraints)
        Used for adding image/objects inside the contraints grid
        Parameters:
        name - name of the item placed
        x - top left co-ord X
        y - top left co-ord Y
        dx - length X
        dy - length Y
        createSubConstraints - if set to true will create a new arraylist

      • checkInside

        public boolean checkInside(int x,
                  int y)
        Given a co-ordinate. it will check to see if it is inside the given constraint box
        Parameters:
        x - co-ordinate
        y - co-ordinate
        Returns:
        true / false

      • checkImageExists

        public java.lang.String checkImageExists(int x,
                                int y)
        Checks to see if an image/object/a rectangle exists within a given constraint box
        Parameters:
        x - co-ordinate
        y - co-ordinate
        Returns:
        Name the name of the image found, will give a null if its not found
